subtitle: A very easy dessert to make. Keep a bag of fruits of the forest in your freezer and you have a lovely store cupboard recipe.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a 1 litre pie dish.
Put a layer of bread into the pie dish.
Top with half the fruits and half the sugar.
Top with remaining fruit and sugar.
Finish with a layer of bread.
Beat the milk and eggs together. Strain and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 10 min.
Bake in the oven for about 35 min or until just set and pale golden brown.

title: Fruits of the forest bread and butter pudding
